title: The Clinics Assistant
welcome: Welcome to Skin care & Beauty Medical Assistant! You can ask me about any skin disease or describe the symptoms you are suffering from, and I will provide you with the possible disease. This application does not replace a visit to the doctor.
input_placeholder: Ask about a condition or describe symptoms...
cant_answer: I'm sorry, I cannot answer this question at the moment. Please rephrase or ask a different question.
